959170.name: John:Condemned
959170.description: John: Condemned is a psychological horror game. John, a man trained from a very young age to be a murderer, is contacted for a final assignment. He will embark on a journey of uncertain destination and his only wish is to be able to return home. In an absolutely hostile environment and with even worse company... Will John be able to go all the way?
959170.supported_languages:
英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
